note:
Posting about a full range of interests: Tai Chi, Food esp'ly vegetarian and plant based, Climate Change, Music, Politics from a pragmatic progressive perspective, Outdoors in Colorado and elsewhere.
No CWs for those topics. In general, I prefer hashtags to CWs -- I tag my content, you decide to filter or not.

Low threshold for BS and trolling. No shitposters please. Often follow back.

He/Him
